name: YusukeSim2k17
description:
P5GB pre-alpha version 1.0

Playtime: 5-10 minutes

Warning: There is a known error where the game will crash from an "uncaught type error". It's kind of random when it happens and I've had difficulty figuring out how to fix it. Sorry for the inconvenience, but the prototype is only 10 minutes long, so if this occurs hit F5 to reload to the title screen and you can use shift to skip through the dialogue to get back to where you were.
